message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500.  I believe it's highly valuable and will be a great asset to you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $11,250?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,750. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,500 and $11,250. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,750?
